description: Aspose.Tasks is a class library for working with Microsoft Project files. Using Aspose.Tasks for .NET you can work with MPP, MPT, XML, XLSX, HTML, PDF, XAML and other formats in your applications.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:

Features

TASKS-33818 Read details column in usage views from mpp files
TASKS-33820 TASKS-33818 Read details column in usage view from 2010-2013 mpp files
TASKS-33819 TASKS-33818 Read details column in usage view from 2003-2007 mpp files
TASKS-33742 Inserting a task through MSP in updated MPP by AT sets NA dates for existing tasks  
 
Bug fixes

TASKS-33833 Task.Calendar not set properly while writing to MPP
TASKS-33829 Columns missed while rendering MPP to PDF
TASKS-33828 Table contents changed while reading/writing for MPP -> PDF conversion
TASKS-33827 Resource Name changes while MPP->PDF conversion
TASKS-33794 Text alignment is disturbed in MPP to PDF conversion
title: Aspose.Tasks for .NET
